definition: having the supreme power lying in the body of citizens entitled to vote for officers and representatives responsible to them or characteristic of such government, an advocate of a republic (usually in opposition to a monarchy)
details:
adjective
- having the supreme power lying in the body of citizens entitled to vote for officers and representatives responsible to them or characteristic of such government
= example: having the supreme power lying in the body of citizens entitled to vote for officers and representatives responsible to them or characteristic of such government
- relating to or belonging to the Republican Party
noun
- an advocate of a republic (usually in opposition to a monarchy)
